ygData.subject: RE: Gnomestock
ygData.msgSnippet: Gnomestock99 was a success!  At least I had a blast.  Thanks to Rotgut for putting it togeather and also to the other brother and sister gnomes of Sol Ro for
ygData.messageBody:
Gnomestock99 was a success! At least I had a blast. Thanks to Rotgut for
putting it togeather and also to the other brother and sister gnomes of Sol
Ro for bringing the kegs! It was a nice way to celebrate the knowledge of
the 3rd Tinkering Book. We had cliff jumping, a drunken race, a party at
King Akanon's in which he actually killed himself for some reason, a
levitate party and many brawls. Some of us turned in our books to the POD.
I think I saw 3 GMs there, 2 of which were fellow gnomes. A great time of
general Gnomeing about. And I kicked a couple butts, including Ubershadows!
=) But I died many horrible deaths, too. I look forward to the next
Gnomestock!

Kilkin Cobblepot - 28th Gemchopper - Fen Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: Tony Buser [mailto:gr0k@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 9:30 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Gnomestock

From: "Tony Buser" <gr0k@...>

Well I had fun. heh but I didn't see any fireworks display!
:( Well maybe
there was a display, but I blinked and missed it. :)

At the next one we should all get levitate and go to the top
of the
windmills! :) I did that once before, it was pretty fun.
Would be quite a
sight to see 40 gnomes all crowded on the roofs of the
windmills. heh you
can see pictures of me on the roofs at
http://www.juju.org/photos/everquest/

Also next time we should try and get the news sites like
stratics to post a
message on the news page about it so we can get even more
people to come.
Though I've never seen that many people in the akanon zone
at one time. heh

- the ORIGINAL Ubershadow Leprechaun - Gnome Rogue -
Erollisi Marr (ignore
that guy that stole my name on Solusek Ro grr)

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
